entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
